item.title: Liquor Shop Licenses Allotted Transparently Through Lucky Draw Under Collector B.M. Santhosh’s Supervision
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The process of allotting liquor shop licenses through a lucky draw was conducted transparently and peacefully at the Collector’s Conference Hall on Monday under the supervision of District Collector B.M. Santhosh.
Officials made elaborate arrangements to ensure the smooth conduct of the event without any irregularities. The lottery process was carried out in strict adherence to the new Excise Policy rules and regulations.
A total of 774 applications were received for 34 liquor shops ac...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
